column5: We're going up to Mahkwa in Sept. Anyone been up there this year? Hows the drive-in? Fishing? Water levels?Thanks, Skiball

We were there June 15th thru 22nd..Water was about normal no problems at all.Fish were biting great.We caught all the walleyes we wanted.Northerns were really hot. The new road in to Mahkwa is rough but they have a huge trailer parking lot..All in all not bad!!
